attributes.action: Begin negotiations with a view to rejoining the EU
attributes.additional_details: Being outside the EU and the single market is causing untold damage to our economy and reputation on the global stage, not least relations with our closet allies. We need to reverse the tide of ever increasing isolation.
attributes.background: Begin negotiations with the EU with a view to agreeing a more favourable trade deal which could lead onto membership of the single market and subsequently EU membership.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700005
